title: Healer Girl
synopsis: The story will follow four girls who seek to use their songs to heal and soothe the people of their world. The tagline reads, "Kindhearted, powerful songs heal the world. These are beautiful miracles sung by humanity."
staff: [['Irie, Yasuhiro', ['Director']], ['Kimura, Noboru', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Akiya, Yukie', ['Character Design']]]
